resources.string: Password must be at least 6 characters with 1 letter and 1 number.

Welcome to the Go-No-Go test! Once the test begins, you will be prompted with either a \"Go\" or \"No Go\" event. Tap as fast as possible for \"Go,\" and make sure NOT to tap the screen when \"No Go\" appears. When the trial is finished, you\'ll be able to see a breakdown of your score and, if you\'re logged in, how you compare to other users!

This is a simple reaction test. When the lower section of the screen flashes GREEN, tap as quickly as you can! If you don\'t react in time, the screen will flash RED. When ready, click the button in the middle of the test area!
